title: Leave it to Kasumin!
detail_text: <:th_ch0202/>Hey hey, take a look at Island Kasumin-! Kasumin got the recipe from Kanata-senpai and made a castle! Also, here, this is the dance hall, and this is the princess’ garden!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0209/>Island Kasumin…. is amazing. It’s so sparkly<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0202/>What about yours, Rinako? Show me, show me-<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0209/>Here<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0202/>….? Are you still not sure about what to make it….?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0209/>….Yeah, I have no idea…. I don’t normally…. play this kind of game….<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0202/>Is that so? But Rinako, you’re good at games right? Like wooosh, or kaboom, or zoooom, or something like that, isn’t that amazing<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0209/>Yeah…. I’m good at…. things like those. But…. I don’t really have any experience with this.... Even though everyone made a promise to make a concert hall together…. I’m sorry. Rina-chan’s board 「Feeling down」<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0202/>Guess it can’t be helped-, it’s Kasumin’s time to shine huh-♪ Nihihi, according to Kasumin’s research, the price of bubbles on Island Shizuko is about to blow up. So let’s make a lot of bubbles! After that, let’s catch a lot of fish, then a lot of bugs.... then get another price explosion!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0209/>Kasumi-chan is so dependable…. Rina chan’s board 「Mesmerized」<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
